metadata.title: CVE-2013-1950 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The svc_dg_getargs function in libtirpc 0.2.3 and earlier allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (rpcbind crash) via a Sun RPCrequest with crafted arguments that trigger a free of an invalid pointer.

criterions.comment: ntirpc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
